member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.PollingDuplexHttpBinding
member.summary: Represents a binding that a Silverlight version 2 client can use to configure endpoints that can communicate with Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services that are similarly configured for duplex communication with a polling client.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.PollingDuplexHttpBinding.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.PollingDuplexHttpBinding.#ctor(System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurityMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The value of that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.PollingDuplexHttpBinding.CreateBindingElements
member.summary: Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.
member.returns: The that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by the .

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.PollingDuplexHttpBinding.InactivityTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum interval of time that can pass without activity on a channel before the client or server channel enters a faulted state. The default value is 10 minutes.
member.returns: The value that specifies the maximum interval of time that can pass without activity on a channel before the channel enters a faulted state.
member.exception: The value is less than zero or it is larger than the maximum time allowed.

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PollingDuplexBindingElement
member.summary: Represents the binding element that enables duplex communication between a Silverlight version 2 client and a service.
